DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether acupuncture effective relieving shortness breath among breast lung cancer patient .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis local metastatic breast lung cancer Shortness breath onset cancer diagnosis Life expectancy least 4 week Prior acupuncture Other condition suspect cause shortness breath , congestive heart failure , sarcoid disease , pneumonia , obesity No chest wall deformity Neuromuscular disorder Pulmonary vascular disease Anemia Uncontrolled pain infection Heart valve dysfunction
